name: PROTECT THE 1ST, INC.
sampleDescriptions: Protect the 1st exists to ensure that the rights enshrined in the First Amendment are protected.It will monitor and lobby for federal legislation that implicates those rights.

Free Flow of Information Act ( not introduced at present). Would give journalists a statutory privilege to refrain from revealing confidential news sources.
